all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Remember the worth of souls is great in the sight of God;
Doctrine and Covenants 18:10
Quote of the Day
"To help us become holy, the Lord invites us to walk with Him."
Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
